name: Paranoia (itch) (Carb Loaded)
description:
Paranoia - a tendency on the part of an individual or group toward excessive or irrational suspiciousness and distrustfulness of others

Game made for BenBonk 2020 Game Jam - Trust No One

Made by JuiceDev (https://juicedev.itch.io/) and MeltingCat (https://meltingcat.itch.io/)

Credits

Gun shot sound and bird sounds taken from free online assets
